greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Möbius transform of A156552.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2048
program: A064989(n) = {my(f); f = factor(n); if((n>1 && f[1,1]==2), f[1,2] = 0); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1)); factorback(f)};

(Scheme, with memoization-macro definec) (definec (A297112 n) (cond ((<= n 2) (- n 1)) ((odd? n) (* 2 (A297112 (A064989 n)))) ((= 2 (modulo n 4)) (A297112 (/ n 2))) (else (* 2 (A297112 (/ n 2)))))) ;; _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 27 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 26 2017
